text: Ara manusera majhe ke'u-ke'u allah‌ke chere an'yake murabbi bale grahana kare, tara tadera bhalobase allah‌ke bhalobasara n'yaya. Tabe yara imana eneche allah‌ra prati tadera bhalobasa prabalatara. Aphasosa! Yara an'yaya kare tara yadi dekhato -- yakhana sasti tara dekhate paya, takhana samasta ksamata puropuribhabe allah‌ra, ara allah nihsandeha sasti dite kathora.
